description:
path: fixes glob to return entire set of paths even on directory error.

Glob orginally would drop already discovered matches when encountering
an error while scanning a directory structure, especially permission
errors. This behavior does not comply with the default mode for the
POSIX glob function.

Fixes issue 1610.
